quote.text: Don’t seek that all that comes about should come about as you wish, but wish that everything that comes about should come about just as it does, and then you’ll have a calm and happy life.
quote.author: Epictetus
quote.aiInsight:
• Parenthood
    • Embrace the journey of raising children by accepting that they will grow and change in ways you may not plan; this acceptance nurtures both you and your child.
    • Just as nature unfolds without interference, let your parenting be guided by patience and understanding, fostering a calm and resilient family life.
  • Leadership
    • True leadership comes from the acceptance of unforeseen challenges; harness these moments as opportunities to cultivate wisdom and inspire trust.
    • By aligning your expectations with reality instead of imposing rigid desires, you can guide your team gracefully through uncertainty toward collective growth.
  • Product Management
    • In the dynamic sphere of product development, embrace market changes and user feedback as natural elements of the process instead of obstacles.
    • An adaptive mindset—where every outcome is valued as a lesson—leads to innovative solutions and a more grounded, effective strategy.
